82663.<center>～はじめて ポーカーをプレイされる方へ～<left>\n<br>:
For First Time Poker Players
In order to prevent seat occupancy, players who have not been playing or operating their poker hand for five minutes will be asked to
leave the poker table. Even if you are in the middle of a double-up, you will be declared a loser and asked to leave the table.
Please refrain from speaking in a manner that may cause inconvenience to others around you.
Please cooperate with us and enjoy the game with good manners. Good luck to you. Casino Owner, Von Baldi

82664.<center>～はじめて ルーレットをプレイされる方へ～<left>\n<br:
～For First Time Roulette Players～
In order to prevent seat occupancy, players who do not bet for five consecutive games will be asked to leave the roulette table.
Please refrain from speaking in a manner that may cause inconvenience to others around you.
Please cooperate with us and enjoy the game with good manners. Good luck to you. ～ Casino Owner, Von Baldi

82665.<center>～はじめて スロットをプレイされる方へ～<left>\n<br>:
～For First Time Slot Players～
In order to prevent seat occupancy, players who have not been playing oroperating a slot machine for 5 minutes will be asked to leave
the table. Even if you are in the middle of a bonus game, you will be asked to leave.
Please refrain from speaking in a manner that may cause inconvenience to others around you.
Please cooperate with us and enjoy the game with good manners. Good luck to you. ～ Casino Owner, Von Baldi

Bingo Tickets and Casino Play Tickets cannot be used to play Bingo during the event.

276370.カジノレイド祭りが 開催中です。\n（フロア<%nW_INSTANCE_NO>:
The Casino Raid Festival is underway. (Floor <%dW_INSTANCE_NO>　<%sCAS_room>　<%sCAS_table>)
There is someone here on your blacklist. Play Bingo for 500 Tokens anyway?

276371.<color_yellow>\nカジノレイド祭りが 終了しました。\n引き続き:
<color_yellow>The Casino Raid Festival has ended. Please
use Bingo Tickets or Casino Play Tickets
to continue playing.<color_white>
